description:
Chiaki is a Free and Open Source Software Client for PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5 Remote Play for Linux, FreeBSD, OpenBSD, Android, macOS, Windows, Nintendo Switch and potentially even more platforms

Chiaki is an open-source application that lets you remotely play games from your PlayStation 4 or 5 (PS4/PS5) on various devices like computers
This is a release containing all updates and contributions accumulated over the last two years
